Question
========

A pure coin is thrown up three times. The event A = all times lies heads up, has probability: 1/8. What then is the probability of A^c^?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/8
* 3/8
* 5/8
* 7/8

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/8: Incorrect
* 3/8: Incorrect
* 5/8: Incorrect
* 7/8: Correct
